mapper.select: select getMNCodeByAddress( #{pDistrName, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pStSortName, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pStreetName, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pHouseNum, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pHousePart, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pFlatNum, javaType=string, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as account_number from dual
